name: Color Blast for PC
description:
A unique and new game that involves colors

You control a single white block, protecting yourself from the other colors who try to destroy you, destroy them and show them what you are made of

This game looks a lot like Space Invaders. But a little different, and ofc, this game is completely free to download and play but optionally pay. This is also just a single "exe" app, containing less than 200 MB

HOW TO PLAY

  • Just use "A" and "D" or the arrow keys to move the white brick
  • Press your space bar to shoot (hold to repeatedly shoot)
  • Click on the board to pause and take a break
  • You only have 3 lives, don't get hit

MAIN GOAL

  • Survive as long as you can and make a high score (this game does not store high scores)
  • Avoid getting hit by the projectiles that the other colored bricks shoot
  • If you get hit, you loss one life, if you lose all your lives, you loose
  • Try to have fun :)

HOW I MADE THIS

This  game was first made on HTML, then processed through a lot of apps (including: Nativefier, Resource Hacker, and Enigma Virtual box) For the rest of steps on how I made this, download "Color Blast (source code).zip" and read "PLS READ MEEEEEE.txt"

ONE MORE THING

Some things (or even the whole app) may not work, it is because this game is just recently released, so please comment if this game did not run
